{"id":969011720,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1686502959,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"74 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/969011720/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Collecting Chocolates","memory":"44.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long minCost(int[] nums, int x) {\n        int n = nums.length;\n        long sum = 0;\n        long temp[] = new long[n];\n        for(int i = 0 ; i < nums.length ; i++){\n            sum += nums[i];\n            temp[i] = nums[i];\n        }\n\n        for(int rotation = 1; rotation < n ; rotation++ ){\n            long cost = 1L * rotation * x;\n\n            for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; i++){\n                long val = nums[(rotation+i)% n];\n                temp[i] = Math.min(temp[i],val);\n                cost += temp[i];\n            }\n\n            sum = Math.min(sum,cost);\n        }\n        return sum;\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"collecting-chocolates","has_notes":false}
